DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Sex Behavior With Other Person Sex Behavior With Male Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the donor had sexual activity with others who are men and who have had a history of sex with men as provided by the primary history source.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Sex Behavior With Other Person Sex Behavior With Male Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._A form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A human being._A form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.
